Home Security Facts

2.5M
Home break-ins annually
66%
Are burglaries
60%
Occur during daytime
83%
Target residential homes

Impact of Security Systems:

  • Homes without security systems are 3x more likely to be burglarized
  • Visible security systems deter 60% of burglars
  • Security cameras reduce crime by 50% in surrounding areas
  • Monitored systems have faster police response times

Security System Components

Our comprehensive security systems include multiple layers of protection to secure every entry point and monitor your entire property.

Control Panel

The brain of your security system with touchscreen interface, wireless communication, and backup power.

Features:

  • 7" color touchscreen display
  • Wireless and cellular communication
  • Battery backup power
  • Voice prompts and alerts
  • Smart home integration hub
  • User-friendly interface

Benefits:

  • Central control of all security devices
  • Easy arming and disarming
  • System status at a glance
  • Multiple user codes
  • Remote access capability

Door & Window Sensors

Wireless sensors that detect when doors and windows are opened, providing perimeter protection.

Features:

  • Wireless installation
  • Long battery life (3-5 years)
  • Tamper-resistant design
  • Low-profile appearance
  • Instant alert transmission
  • Weather-resistant for outdoor use

Benefits:

  • Immediate intrusion detection
  • No visible wiring
  • Easy installation on any door/window
  • Reliable operation in all weather
  • Low maintenance requirements

Motion Detectors

Advanced PIR sensors that detect movement while ignoring pets and environmental factors.

Features:

  • Pet-immune technology (up to 80 lbs)
  • Dual-technology sensors
  • Adjustable sensitivity
  • Wide-angle coverage
  • Anti-masking protection
  • Battery or hardwired options

Benefits:

  • Interior space protection
  • False alarm reduction
  • Pet-friendly operation
  • Strategic placement flexibility
  • Backup perimeter protection

Security Cameras

High-definition cameras with night vision, motion detection, and cloud storage capabilities.

Features:

  • 1080p or 4K resolution
  • Night vision capability
  • Motion-activated recording
  • Two-way audio communication
  • Weather-resistant housing
  • Cloud and local storage

Benefits:

  • Visual verification of events
  • Evidence collection
  • Remote monitoring capability
  • Deterrent effect on intruders
  • Package delivery monitoring

Glass Break Sensors

Acoustic sensors that detect the specific sound frequency of breaking glass.

Features:

  • Acoustic glass break detection
  • 25-foot protection radius
  • Adjustable sensitivity
  • False alarm immunity
  • Easy ceiling or wall mounting
  • Battery-powered operation

Benefits:

  • Protects multiple windows
  • Detects forced entry attempts
  • No window modification required
  • Covers large glass areas
  • Complements door/window sensors

Environmental Sensors

Smoke, carbon monoxide, flood, and temperature sensors for comprehensive home protection.

Features:

  • Smoke and heat detection
  • Carbon monoxide monitoring
  • Water leak detection
  • Temperature monitoring
  • Wireless connectivity
  • Long-life sensors

Benefits:

  • Early fire detection
  • CO poisoning prevention
  • Water damage prevention
  • HVAC system monitoring
  • 24/7 environmental protection

Smart Home Integration

Your security system becomes the foundation of a complete smart home ecosystem, controlling and coordinating with other connected devices.

Smart Locks

Integration Features:

  • Automatic locking when system is armed
  • Remote lock/unlock capability
  • Temporary access codes for guests
  • Entry/exit automation
  • Lock status monitoring
  • Forced entry detection

Lighting Control

Integration Features:

  • Lights flash during alarm events
  • Automatic lighting when disarmed
  • Vacation lighting simulation
  • Pathway lighting activation
  • Energy-efficient scheduling
  • Scene-based lighting control

Thermostat Control

Integration Features:

  • Energy savings when away
  • Automatic temperature adjustment
  • Geofencing-based control
  • Vacation mode settings
  • Environmental monitoring
  • HVAC system protection

Garage Door Control

Integration Features:

  • Remote garage door operation
  • Status monitoring and alerts
  • Automatic closing when armed
  • Vacation mode security
  • Entry point protection
  • Integration with vehicle sensors

Mobile App Control

Complete control of your security system from anywhere in the world with our intuitive mobile applications.

Mobile App Features

Arm/Disarm System

Control your security system from anywhere with one-touch arming and disarming.

Live Video Streaming

View live camera feeds and recorded clips directly on your smartphone.

Instant Alerts

Receive immediate push notifications for all security events and system status changes.

Smart Device Control

Control lights, locks, thermostats, and other connected devices from one app.

User Management

Add family members, set access permissions, and manage user codes remotely.

Event History

Review detailed logs of all system activity, including photos and video clips.

Benefits of Mobile Control

Peace of Mind

Check on your home anytime, anywhere, and receive instant notifications of any activity.

Convenience

No need to remember to set the alarm - control everything remotely with your smartphone.

Energy Savings

Adjust thermostats, control lighting, and manage energy usage even when you're away.

Family Safety

Know when family members arrive home safely and grant temporary access to guests.

Professional Monitoring Services

24/7 professional monitoring ensures immediate response to security events, even when you can't respond to alerts.

UL-Listed Monitoring Centers

Our monitoring centers are staffed 24/7 by trained professionals and meet the highest industry standards for security and reliability.

Monitoring Center Features:

  • UL-listed and certified facilities
  • Redundant communication systems
  • Backup power and internet
  • Trained security professionals
  • Multi-path signal verification
  • Direct emergency service contact

Emergency Response Process

1

Signal Received

Monitoring center receives alarm signal within seconds of activation.

2

Verification Attempt

Trained operator attempts to contact you using multiple methods.

3

Emergency Dispatch

If unable to reach you or if confirmed emergency, authorities are contacted immediately.

4

Follow-up

Continued monitoring and follow-up until situation is resolved.

Types of Monitoring

Intrusion Monitoring

24/7 monitoring of all security sensors with immediate police dispatch when needed.

  • Door and window sensors
  • Motion detectors
  • Glass break sensors
  • Panic buttons

Fire Monitoring

Smoke and heat detection with direct fire department notification.

  • Smoke detectors
  • Heat sensors
  • Carbon monoxide detection
  • Emergency evacuation alerts

Environmental Monitoring

Protection against water damage, extreme temperatures, and other environmental hazards.

  • Water leak sensors
  • Temperature monitoring
  • Humidity sensors
  • Power outage detection

Medical Monitoring

Personal emergency response with medical alert capabilities.

  • Wearable panic buttons
  • Fall detection sensors
  • Medical emergency dispatch
  • Family notification

Professional Installation Process

1

Security Assessment

Comprehensive evaluation of your property to identify vulnerabilities and determine optimal sensor placement.

2

Custom System Design

Design a security system tailored to your specific needs, lifestyle, and budget requirements.

3

Professional Installation

Certified technicians install all components with minimal disruption to your daily routine.

4

System Testing

Comprehensive testing of all sensors, cameras, and communication systems to ensure proper operation.

5

User Training

Complete training on system operation, mobile app usage, and emergency procedures.
